data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Botero-Trujillo, Ricardo (2008): First record of the scorpion genus Chactopsis Kraepelin in Colombia, with the description of Chactopsis carolinae sp. nov. (Scorpiones: Chactidae). Zootaxa 1743: 34-42, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181581
